name: Maryland Casualty Company v. Warren McGrath, Nancy Zihala-McGrath, Martin Burridge d/b/a Burridge Tent Rentals, Martiin Burridge (Two Cases); Petition of Warren McGrath, Nancy Zihala-McGrath; Petition of Martin Burridge d/b/a Burridge Tent Rentals

opinions.text:
PETITION FOR ALLOWANCE OF APPEAL
Denied.
57 Justices WECHT and Justice MUNDY did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
--------
